pkgmetadata.longdescription: Electron is a framework for building cross-platform desktop applications. This package provides the Electron runtime, which is based on Chromium and Node.js. It is not useful on its own (except for testing purposes), but packages that use Electron can depend on it to provide the runtime environment instead of relying on a downloaded binary.

use.flag: With USE=proprietary-codecs, use media-video/ffmpeg-chromium for media playback instead of media-video/ffmpeg
